title: Update footer to show Oklahoma as location founded, not service area only

requirements.text: Update the footer text in the Layout component (frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx) to change 'Serving Oklahoma Since 2025' to 'Founded in Oklahoma, 2025' or similar text that clarifies Oklahoma as the location where the business was founded, while maintaining the founding year of 2025

quotes: the location dfounded is oklahoma not only

constraints: Do not modify the header tagline 'Oklahoma's Paranormal Investigators'

nonGoals: Changing other Oklahoma references throughout the site
